description: Corrections on the solo based on the original isolated track (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=huryqOk5Wjs&t=55s). Note that Marty does fast bends (to pitch) instead of vibrato most of the time (best played in GP5: Songsterr/Tuxguitar doesn't manage complex bends well). End part needed patience to figure out (Slowed down to a crawl ; made sure relevant notes are synched with the drum track), that's actually what he came out with in his burst of improvisation.
title: Tornado of Souls
